MASSACHUSETTS GENERAL HOSPITAL — HARVARD MEDICAL SCHOOL
THE MGH CANCER CENTER

Building 149, 13¢h Street
Charlestown, MA. 02129
‘Telephone (617)726-5600

March 9, 1990

Harmon C. McAllister, PD.
Research Director

‘The Council for Tobacco Research-U.S.A., Inc.
900 Third Avenue

New York, N.Y. 10022

 

Dear Dr, McAllister,

Enclosed please find a preliminary proposal titled "Colon Cancer and MHC Class I Genes” for research
suppott from The Council for Tobacco Research, I have also included a biographical sketch with
biliography and reprints from three recent publications which are directly relevant to the proposed studies,

| thank you for your consideration of these matters

Sincerely Yours,

Sebastiano Gattoni-Celli, MD.

summary: The Council for Tobacco Research-U.S.A., Inc. sent the proposal to Massachusetts General Hospital in 1990. The proposal was titled "Colon Cancer and MHC Class I Genes" and included a biographical sketch with reprints from three recent publications which are directly relevant to the proposed studies.
